trans-unit.source: Causes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> to stop executing and returns control back to the calling method.
trans-unit.target: Determina il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"> </xref> per arrestare l'esecuzione e restituisca il controllo al metodo di chiamata.

trans-unit.source: The Halt action is similar to a break command, although it ends the execution of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>.
trans-unit.target: L'azione ALT è simile a un comando di interruzione, anche se termina l'esecuzione di <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>

trans-unit.source: The Halt action will stop execution of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> when all the actions in the same action block have finished executing.
trans-unit.target: L'azione ALT arresterà l'esecuzione del <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>quando tutte le azioni nello stesso blocco di azione hanno terminato l'esecuzione.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep copy of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea una copia completa dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> that is identical to this instance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> identica a questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two object instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se due istanze di oggetto sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>Da confrontare con l'attuale <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se gli oggetti sono uguali. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref> utilizzando l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"></xref> context used to execute the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution"> </xref> utilizzata per eseguire il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: context is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: contextè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il codice hash per questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Il codice hash per questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: Returns the fields and properties updated by the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce i campi e le proprietà aggiornate per il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> per gestire il processo di convalida.

trans-unit.source: A list of the fields and properties changed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un elenco dei campi e proprietà modificati dal <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Since <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction"></xref> does not have parameters, the return value will always be an empty list.
trans-unit.target: Poiché <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction"> </xref> non hanno parametri, il valore restituito sarà sempre da un elenco vuoto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the string "Halt".
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la stringa "Halt".

trans-unit.source: The string "Halt".
trans-unit.target: La stringa "Halt".

trans-unit.source: Returns true, no validation is performed.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce true, viene eseguita alcuna convalida.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> per gestire il processo di convalida.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
